title: How to make my own WiFi for free internet use - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s no such thing as a free lunch, but if you have a big vision, you could start your own ISP (internet service provider ex: Cmcast, at&t, wow). Once you pay it off, which would probably require some sort of joint venture in a location where you plan to permanently reside, you could hypothetically have free internet (although it’s not really free because it requires time and money up front, not to mention the cost of maintenance). There are some details here: How to Start Your Own ISP I’m also really interested in doing this some day. I’m just fed up with the bad service and monopolies. It’s just wrong!! Let me know if you actually go through with his project. I’m extremely curious about how it would turn out.
Add a wifi access point to your internet connection, and tell people to use it. Instant free internet for everyone.
